Miles Sound System SDK 6.6h

SAMPLESTAGE

The basic type SAMPLESTAGE describes the stage in the sample pipeline to install the filter on.

Fundamental Values

 Value  Description
 DP_FILTER Specifies the filter provider stage. Once set, the filter will be called before each buffer from the HSAMPLE is copied into mixing buffer. You will almost always use this stage for the Miles filters.
 DP_MERGE Specifies the merge provider stage. The merge provider is called to mix each HSAMPLE's current address into the internal MSS mixing build buffer.


Group: Digital Filter Services
Related Functions: AIL_set_DLS_processor, AIL_set_sample_processor, AIL_set_stream_processor
